description: Episode of Series "Geography of the Americas". This film discusses the cities, industries, agriculture and natural resources of each of the major geographical divisions of Canada. While the film looks at the western region, the central prairies, the Great Lakes region, the Maritime Provinces and the Yukon, it also points out similarities between Canada and the United States.
